imdb_user_reviews.contents: This is where we are as a culture

One of the worst movies I've seen since long
Worst Movie I have ever seen!  **Spoilers**
Cameron Diaz is an incompetent teacher who wants to get a boob job. There is a prize for the teacher whose kids do the best so she uses any means to get it.
Meh...It's Good for a Few Laughs
This movie is very bad indeed
One of the funniest comedies in recent memory, truly funny.

A parade of unpleasant, unfunny individuals.
waste of time -avoid this horrible unfunny movie
